oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Marian McAlister Sawrie
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Marian McAlister Sawrie (October 20,1845 - February 6, 1891), married Wililam S. Sawrie on February 13, 1868, and died in St. Petersburg, Florida. Photograph was taken when she was 16.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Metro Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
